Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Brand asset generator prompt and example output

Turn one logo into 70+ brand assets using AI:
- Logo variations, favicons, design tokens
- Social media kit \(Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, Facebook\)
- Web assets \(OG images, error pages, loading states\)
- Business documents \(letterhead, cards, presentations\)
- Display ads, email templates, video assets
- Brand guidelines and Figma specs

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
